org.upmc.electisim

Class AgentVote

  • Object
    • AgentVote

  • public class AgentVote
extends Object
    A class representing the vote of a single agent after applying the voting strategy.
    See Also:
    org.upmc.electisim.IVotingStrategy, Agent

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AgentVote(Agent agent)
      Build an agent's vote result from an agent.
      AgentVote(Agent agent, Map<IElectable,Integer> scoreMap)
      Build an agent's vote result from an agent and a map of scores
      AgentVote(AgentVote other)
      Builds an agent's vote result from another vote result

    • Constructor Detail

      • AgentVote

        public AgentVote(Agent agent)
        Build an agent's vote result from an agent. The map of scores will hence be empty
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent emitting this vote

      • AgentVote

        public AgentVote(Agent agent,
                 Map<IElectable,Integer> scoreMap)
        Build an agent's vote result from an agent and a map of scores
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent emitting this vote
        scoreMap - the map of scores to be used

      • AgentVote

        Builds an agent's vote result from another vote result
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • setScore

        public void setScore(IElectable candidate,
                     int score)
        Set the score of one candidate
        Parameters:
        candidate - the candidate for which to modify the vote
        score - the score to use

      • getAgent

        public Agent getAgent()
        Returns:
        the agent which emitted this vote

      • getScoreMap

        public Map<IElectable,Integer> getScoreMap()
        Returns:
        the map of scores for this vote

      • getLinearOrder

        public List<IElectable> getLinearOrder()
        Generate a linear order from the map of scores. Is used in many strategies and voting rules
        Returns:
        a linear order on the electable entities in this vote

      • getKBests

        public List<IElectable> getKBests(int k)
        Parameters:
        k - the number of best elements we want
        Returns:
        the k bests candidate in this vote
